data.title: West Milton OH funeral home and cremation
meta_keywords: funeral home in West Milton OH
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - Hale-Sarver Funeral Home offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving West Milton, OH and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
data.meta_site_name: All Obituaries | Hale-Sarver Funeral Home | West Milton OH funeral home and cremation
data.text: Our support in your time of need does not end after the funeral services. Enter your email below to receive a grief support message from us each day for a year. You can unsubscribe at any time.
